intro.description: Vert Capital is a boutique investment and corporate advisory firm located in Perth, Western Australia. We specialise in providing investment advisory services to high net worth investors and corporate advisory and capital raising services to both private and ASX listed companies.

servicesSection.subtitle: Comprehensive financial solutions tailored to your needs
servicesSection.service1Description: Strategic guidance on ASX compliance, governance, mergers and acquisitions, and corporate restructuring for listed and private companies.
servicesSection.service2Description: End-to-end capital raising support including IPOs, placements, rights issues, and investor roadshows for growth-stage companies.
servicesSection.service3Description: Tailored investment management for high net worth individuals, with a focus on ASX equities and alternative assets.

aboutSection.description: We are a boutique investment and corporate advisory firm committed to delivering exceptional results for our clients. Our team brings deep expertise in financial markets, corporate strategy, and investment management.

companiesSection.subtitle: We work alongside ASX-listed companies across resources, technology, and emerging sectors — providing corporate advisory and capital raising support to help them grow.

newsSection.emptyState: Stay tuned for the latest news and market insights from Vert Capital.

ctaSection.subtitle: Ready to take the next step? Get in touch with our team to explore how we can help you achieve your objectives.

investmentOpportunities.title: Investment Opportunities
investmentOpportunities.stockDescription: Access equity investment opportunities through our carefully curated portfolio companies.
investmentOpportunities.fundsDescription: Diversified fund investments managed by our experienced team of capital market professionals.

about.heroSubtitle: Boutique investment and corporate advisory excellence in Perth, Western Australia
about.introDescription1: Vert Capital is a Perth-based boutique investment and corporate advisory firm. We specialise in providing personalised corporate advisory, capital raising, and asset management services to high net worth investors and both private and ASX-listed companies.
about.introDescription2: Founded on the principle that every client deserves institutional-quality advice delivered with a personal touch, our team brings over 15 years of experience across financial markets, corporate strategy, and investment management.
about.introDescription3: As a Corporate Authorised Representative of Barclay Wells Ltd (AFSL No. 235070), we operate within a robust regulatory framework while maintaining the agility and client focus that defines a true boutique firm.
about.afslValue: Corporate Authorised Representative of Barclay Wells Ltd (AFSL No. 235070)
about.servicesSubtitle: Comprehensive financial solutions tailored to your unique needs
about.service1Description: Strategic corporate advisory services including mergers and acquisitions, corporate restructuring, ASX compliance, and strategic planning for businesses seeking to grow, optimise, or exit.
about.service2Description: Expert guidance and execution support for capital raising initiatives, helping companies access the funding they need to achieve their growth objectives.
about.service3Description: Professional investment management services for high net worth individuals, delivering tailored investment strategies aligned with your financial goals and risk appetite.
about.teamSubtitle: Experienced professionals dedicated to your success
about.team1Bio: Petar is the founder and Managing Director of Vert Capital. With extensive experience in corporate advisory, capital markets, and investment management, he leads the firm's strategic direction and client relationships.
about.team2Bio: Laurie heads our Corporate Advisory division, bringing deep expertise in ASX compliance, corporate governance, mergers and acquisitions, and strategic planning for listed and private companies.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
about.value1Description: We operate with the highest ethical standards and transparency in all our dealings.
about.value2Description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service delivery.
about.value3Description: Your success is our success. We put our clients' interests first, always.
about.regulatoryDescription: Vert Capital Pty Ltd (CAR No. 1278768) is a Corporate Authorised Representative of Barclay Wells Ltd, which holds Australian Financial Services Licence No. 235070.
about.ctaDescription: Get in touch with our team to explore how we can help you achieve your financial objectives.

portfolio.heroSubtitle: Our portfolio companies and community partnerships
portfolio.companiesSubtitle: We provide corporate advisory and capital raising services to a select group of ASX-listed companies across resources, technology, and emerging sectors.
portfolio.company1Description: Exploring and developing mineral resources with a focus on sustainable mining practices.
portfolio.company2Description: Advancing technology metals projects for the future of sustainable energy and infrastructure.
portfolio.company3Description: Developing green hydrogen and helium projects with a commitment to clean energy solutions.
portfolio.company4Description: Exploring high-grade mineral deposits with a focus on copper and precious metals.
portfolio.company5Description: International mining corporation specialising in strategic mineral development and partnerships.
portfolio.company6Description: Exploring battery metals and critical minerals for the renewable energy transition.
portfolio.company7Description: Developing phosphate projects to support agricultural growth and food security in Africa.
portfolio.company8Description: Exploring and developing gold and base metal projects with proven geological potential.
portfolio.sponsorshipsSubtitle: Vert Capital is proud to support local sporting organisations and community initiatives across Western Australia.
portfolio.ctaTitle: Interested in Working with Vert Capital?
portfolio.ctaDescription: Whether you're seeking corporate advisory, capital raising support, or investment management, we'd love to hear from you.

homepage.description: Vert Capital is a Perth-based boutique investment and corporate advisory firm specialising in corporate advisory, capital raising, and asset management for ASX-listed companies and high net worth investors.

about.description: Meet the Vert Capital team. Over 15 years of experience in corporate advisory, capital raising, and asset management for ASX-listed companies and high net worth investors in Perth, WA.
